content.detailedDescription: Went to backyard at 5:16am for fresh air. could not sleep. looked up and observed solid glowing object moving very fast directly toward south. no blinking lights. no sound. covered 50+ miles until not visible within under 1 minute. slight path alteration in what appeared to be altitude but speed seemed constant. definitely not an airplane or helicopter.
content.summary: Bright star-like object non pulsating moving at very fast speed covering about 50 miles in under 1 minute

content.detailedDescription: We had just returned from a night out for dinner . i noticed what looked like three dots moving straight up but keeping perfect formation like it was one vehicle . that disappeared quickly but came back so i got excited and had my wife try and see them . when she finally saw the one i saw she got a little scared and thats when we saw the second formation much larger but like the first what appeared to be 6 or 8 dots flying in perfect formation so i assume they were actually one vehicle ?? i have seen all sorts of known planes ,jets, ect. and this was not like anything i have ever seen  .Speeds that were so much faster than are fastest jets , moving miles in seconds ! i for one have been changed and will remain vigilant with camera near by for the next time !
content.summary: My wife and i had just got home when i noticed an unusuall craft for just seconds and it shot up out of sight but came back . we were both able to see them

content.detailedDescription:
1. walked in front of my house to smoke.
2. i noticed it because of how bright it was, and close.  we're near mci airport, and i frequently watch planes arrive and depart.  my eyes are pretty good, i can typically make out what airline is flying overhead from their colors, planes tail logo etc.  this object flew at about the same altitude you would expect to see a traffic helicopter at.
3 and 4.  when i saw it i had no idea what i was looking at.  i instinctively knew it was not an airplane or helicopter.  it was disc shaped, no other shape i could determine due to its brilliance.  it was gold-red-bronze.  like the color of molten lava.  it became brighter as it passed overhead, heading due north.  the we're no flashing lights or changes in color.  it left no trail.  skies were clear no clouds at all.  there was absolutely no sound.  as close as it appeared in relation to planes we regularly see there would always be a sound that follows the passing of an airplane.  it moved extremely fast, faster than any airplane ive ever seen, commercial or military.
5. my first reaction was wtf was that?  then i thought about what it could be: airplane, heli-no.  closer than a satellite.  not a shooting star, unless it was one that was large and about to hit the ground.  way too fast for a blimp.  not lightning.  steady quick purposeful straight line direction at an incredible rate of speed.  then i thought it might be a ufo and got the chills all over.  i walked inside and told my wife and that i don't know what i just saw and described it.  i then checked on our child.  then i started doing google searches for kc ufo sightings.  oddly, there was a video from apr 6 2011 that was remarkably similar, however my sighting was much closer and there was only one object.  i found this site and figured i'd report to see if anyone else saw it.
6. i lost sight of it after it passed overhead then behind a tree and my neighbors house.  i did not peruse-to tell the truth it freaked me out.
content.summary: Bronze disc moved quickly across sky.  silently.

6. i lost sight of it after it passed overhead then behind a tree and my neighbors house.  i did not peruse-to tell the truth it freaked me out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on holiday in chennai . on the harbour i saw that indo-us joint military execrcises were on for the next 10 days . i also saw many ufos seeing the show from above. they were hovering . this naval exercise was a cover for a anti -alien operation by the cia . the uss carl vinson the nuclear powered aircraft carrier is taking part in the joint excercise .

join my facebook group called alien believers for furthur information .
content.summary: Ufo in between indo-us naval exercise - chennai

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in our backyard i noticed one ufo flying at a distance through the trees in my neighbor's yard. thought it was too bright and orange to be a plane or helicopter. walked around to to get a better view and then noticed 2nd ufo, exact same color and size, flying slightly behind the first at about 8 o'clock. i freaked out and asked my wife, 'what the hell is that?' they flew a little closer in a northwestern direction, slowed and then stopped completely. very bright and very orange. at this point i knew we were seeing something strange. both objects hovered over area of chico, ca for about about 2 minutes. 2nd ufo faded and then disappeared. 1st ufo lasted about 10 seconds longer and then quickly disappeared. we were very shocked and amazed.
content.summary: 2 bright glowing orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: My mom comes in and says get outside, it was dark and a star like orb was swirling upwards with a red light following it. she said it started as bright as a close star and then it slowly grew fainter
content.summary: Star like orb with red light around it swirling upwards in the sky growing fainter and fainter

content.detailedDescription: My mom comes in and says get outside, it was dark and a star like orb was swirling upwards with a red light following it. she said it started as bright as a close star and then it slowly grew fainter
content.summary: Star like orb with red light around it swirling upwards in the sky growing fainter and fainter

content.detailedDescription: The night of the last shttle landing we saw this thing.Then it saw us and came in for a look.That is the only way i can describe it
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 incredibly beaming lights,spotlights

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car being driven home by my father. it was about 10:09pm, eastern time april 7th 2012.  we turned the corner and i looked at the moon and saw five red-orange star like objects surrounding it.  i pointed them out to my father, who saw them as well. i was confused as to what it could possibly be and i tried to keep my eyes fixed on them as my father continued to drive.  some 30 seconds later, i got out of  the car and i could still see 3 of the stars left.  they were no longer near the moon but they appeared to be unmoving.  as i watched them, i realized they were fading away, each at a different rate.  even after the phenomenon was over, i was unsure as to what it was that i actually witnessed.
content.summary: Saw 5 red orange stars which slowly faded away at different times

content.detailedDescription: I have never seen a ufo nor still have i live. i was taking a picture of my son'ts new kite flying in sky at the beach this am on nantucket island, ma. long story short i got home and was looking at the pictures and noticed that next to the kite flying in the sky my camera took a picture of something else as well. there was not a cloud in the sky and this object seems to be translucent but also has a definate disc/orb like shape to it. the stangest part of the picture is that the object is reflectng light back towards the sun and you can even clearly see an energy field around the object. i dont know what to make of it. ineed a professional opioion of what it is. i have been staring at it for hours and it had me convinced enough to find this website to get another opinion. like i stated idid not see it with my own eyes nor was i looking for it but my camera did and took a very clear picture of something with a definite shape,reflection, @ what seems to be like an energy type exhaust following behind it like a force field or something. how do i get the video up for people to see and make an opinion? just in case you dont know we are 28 miles out at sea. please let me know what you think asap.
content.summary: Took a pic of new kite flying in sky . in pic there is an oval disc like object that is reflecting the sun and seems to even have a field of energy behind it. you have to see pic for yourself

content.detailedDescription:
I was pulling into my parking spot at my apartment complex and talking on my cellphone to my aunt.  it was fully dark outside, clear skies.  venus and orion were behind me.  i observed a series of 5 lights ascending from the ne toward the sse.  upon seeing the object, i told my aunt what i was seeing and that i needed to get off the phone and videotape what i was seeing.  the lights were red-orange in color - they did not blink - nor did they seem to have other directional lights or strobes.  i spent over 13 years in the military as an infantry officer, and i have never seen anything like these lights in the military or the civilian world.  

the first indication that they were odd was the color.  they did not match any other aircraft light that i had observed.  also, the direction of travel was odd for this area, as was the number of lights.  each was clearly an individual object.  aircraft are required to have both red and green running lights, as well as strobes.  these had neither...Just the strange color light i mentioned previously.  i counted 12 objects prior to them all disappearing.  if they had been airplanes or helicopters, i would have discerned some kind of noise.  there was none.  in all honesty, i said to my aunt, "holy crap, what is that???  let me get going, this is really weird".  i had no idea what i was seeing - but i wanted to get into the dark field near my house in order to see better.  i can state with no equivocation that these lights were like nothing i had ever experienced.

one possibility for the investigator - the wind direction of travel was close to the direction of travel of the lights.  the wind was approximately ne to sw.  close, but not exactly the same as the direction of travel.  also, these craft were clearly under power based upon the speed of travel - it was much faster than the wind velocity.

the objects rose along a similar trajectory - however, at one point, one of the lights overtook one of the others.  however, within seconds, the objects swapped back into order.  i lost sight of the objects as they rose into the sky.

i wasn't afraid or nervous, though my hair was standing up on the back of my neck.  it was a surreal experience.  i called my neighbor to see if he would come out, but he wasn't home.  i took a picture and videotaped the event as well.  

i lost sight of the objects when they ascended out of view into the sky.
content.summary: 12 ascending lights over 7 minutes traveling ne to ssw

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a very bright fire engine red glow coming up out of the trees to the 
south.  it first appeared at about 10 degrees above the horizon.  it moved
from south to north.  after it got about 25 degrees, another one appeared 
from the same spot as the first, traveling at the same speed and direction.
and as that got to about 25 degrees here comes another.  in total, five objects came up from the horizon, all from nearly the same spot on the 
south horizon and all following the first one.  they got dimmer as they
approached about 50 degrees toward the north and eventually disappeared.  the whole incident lasted about fifteen minutes.  if you have ever seen a shuttle pass over,  it looked a lot like that except these were a very bright red glow and eventually got too dim to see.  my wife also saw them.
content.summary: Red lights in the sky   five of them

content.detailedDescription: Me mike and 2 of my other friends had just pulled up at a bridge near osceola high school and we were waiting for another kid to show up. and once again right around 11 my friend mike and i noticed that every thing was eerily quite and the street lights started to just turn on and off but we thought that was normal. but then they started going all spastic then they just stopped and right as mike looked down at his phone to say "weird it's 11:11" a very loud rustle and thump came from the waters edge and i locked eyes with a massive being that was 7 to 9 feet tall skinny, slender and it was dragging a massive bag. one that looked like u put a christmas tree in but what terrified me were its pure white glowing florescent eyes and then dipped under the bridge... tears still come to my eyes when i talk about this and i'm absolutely serious that i had to draw it to just get it off my mind because it was just burned into me as an image
content.summary: Completely unatural

content.detailedDescription: We this time were sky watching at jungle prada and we witnessed these massive orange orbs that came from no where and at first there were just 2 the a 3rd showed up in the blink of an eye. they hovered, rotated and flew over the area we realized was the first place we saw the child figure and blue orb ( st. pete beach). this all happened for ruffly 4 minutes till the orbs just dispersed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Amazing like nothing i've seen

content.detailedDescription: Me and my 2 friends were sky watching on st.Pete beach when we didnt c anything we started to look down and our breaths were taken away as we saw this blue orb coming towards the beach and it stoped just above where the waves were breaking on the shoreline and as we looked underneath it we saw this small almost glass like child sized figure and it paced the beach for about 15 yards till one of us spoke to see if the others were seeing it and it froze where it was and looked at us and the hole time the orb was above it... but as we saw it turn towards our direction the orb strobes 3 times so bright that it was unbelievable and after the light it was just gone... and we were scared shitless, we sprinted all the way to my car and went straight home & i never remember running that fast in my entire life.
content.summary: Mentally striking and unknowingly frightening

content.detailedDescription:
I was home with my daughter on the evening of jan 10th 2009, i walked outside to take out the trash and noticed a giant disc slowly moving towards the east. the disc appeared to have no color, it looked transparent or cloaked, when you looked at the disc it looked like heat or static electricity, it looked wavy like a hot street on a summer day.

suddenly a 2nd and third one appeared almost as if they were in formation, not a noise made from them not a single cloud in the sky that night. i told my daughter to grab my camera and snapped about four or five pictures. 

this is the strange part, when i went to save the pictures to my computer and my camera wasnt responding i was able to recover the pictures from the memory stick, but the camera since has been useless. 

when i did get the pictures saved to my computer they were not in the order as taken as they normally save that way they were all scattered out of order.
content.summary: Transparent disc with static eltrcitiy refelecting light off the edges

content.detailedDescription: Thursday april 5 2012 approximately 3:00 pm i was traveling north bound on hwy 3 north of brunkild manitoba when i noticed the object in the sky, it was flying higher than any military or commercial aircraft and it left no vapor trail at that altitude. object was a very large cigar shape and metallic in appearance. no other objects were visible at the time of the sighting. the sky was very clear and no clouds were visible. object was ascending and disappeared into the atmosphere.
content.summary: Object was ascending when i noticed it. sky was clear and object left no vapor trails at the altitude in which it was traveling.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was heading into work with my boss.

2. my boss noticed it and pointed me to it.

3. i thought it was an asteroid because of its fiery color until my boss told me it was moving upward.

4. it appeared from across the street and seemed to do a slight lateral curve (while heading upward on an incline).  as it got closer, it's angle of elevation changed to a degree that i've never seen a plane ascend at.  all the while it was making no noise whatsoever (which is a shock because it was pretty close) and was moving far too quickly to be a weather balloon.  seemed too fast to be a helicopter or plane either.  the most shocking part was how high it kept going.  it continued to ascend and when i looked away for a second, my boss told me it disappeared.  we both looked to see if it would come back and it didn't.   

5.  at first i was scared because i thought we might be getting pelted with a space rock, but then i was nervous and excited by the prospect of what we were witnessing.  now i'm a little frightened by the implications of what i saw and any possible future contacts with any kind of extraterrestrials or those that may be trying to hide them...  i've been pretty public about this because i didn't feel like hiding it.

6.  i looked away from the object to see how well my picture of it turned out (not that well...) and my boss just said it was gone.  i don't know if it turned its "lights" off or something, but i'm reasonably sure that it left the atmosphere do to its continuing ascension and the last altitude i personally saw it at.  i've never seen anything fly that high up (at least that quickly).
content.summary: Orange light with randomly appearing orange-red light on top

content.detailedDescription:
This is the four time i witnessed the same object over a 10 day period in the western sky at 11 pm cst. wichita falls, texas
very bright hovering within a mile or more from my residence.
appears to be venus about 10 degrees above the horizon but twice as
bright.  however, it's not venus!  i can see venus and saturn aligned with moon.
this object is not a planet or star it's stationary as thou it's observing.
sheppard air force base is not flying or training at this hour.  it was very quiet clear evening observing the object for 30 minutes.  it slowly
faded in brightness and slipped below the trees not far from my location.


at 12 midnight i witness another object appearing to be a star not nearly as bright, changing colors from white light to red. i watched for nearly 2 hours as the object slowly faded out of site to the northwest.
this object projects or mimics a star or planet somewhat like mars in the 
night sky.  it's hovering at 3,000 feet very slowing moving to the northwest over 2 hours period until it disappeared from site.
content.summary: 4 out of the last ten nights on clear nite sky, twice as bright as venus, hovering. went behide trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the path that runs adjacent in between bunting rd and niagara st where the old railway tracks used to be. when i reached linwell rd i looked up at the sky and saw the sun reflecting off a chromed object slowly making it's way to the east less than 200 feet above the rooftops. i watched the object for a matter of seconds before it disappeared behind the trees in the area. i walked a kilometre down this path and when i approached scott st i got a better look at the object as it crossed my path again. i saw it had a solid smooth and shiny surface, no visible wings and no tail fin or identifying marks and was in the shape of a cigar. it was moving far too slow to be a conventional aircraft and far too low. the object was silent and looked magnificent as the sun was just mirrored against it. it was approximately 30-50 feet long. i've never seen a ufo before but i never felt so at peace as when i adored this object. again, i watched this object for about a minute before it disappeared from my line of sight behind trees and houses.
content.summary: Large and very reflective. no wings, no tail fin.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching vultures circling when i noticed a faint star-like object, white in color.  sighted nearly due east.  i suspected a ufo since it was not moving, and no stars are observable at mid-day.  surprise at the time of the sighting.  had to leave my home.  i am a veteran navy aircrewman with several thousand hours flight time, and amatuer astromer.  i notice when i see things in the sky that do not normally belong there.
content.summary: As stated below.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving from joshua to cleburne on hwy 174 headed south. 
3 of us witnessed a meteor like object moving at exceptional rates of speed from east to west miles away. 
about two to three minutes later a extremely bright ligh lit up, hovering over the highway about 2 miles outside of joshua city limits. 

the shape was undiscernable but the lights were very bright. a few seconds later the object makes a barrel roll, and dissipates into what it looked like the first time we saw it-a singular bright light- then the object vanished with no trace. 
this happened at about 22:50
content.summary: Looked like meteor flying across horizon at unreal speeds, then reappeared hovering over highway, the. disappeared again

content.detailedDescription:
This is a copy of the letter i sent to rick at ufo picks.

a couple of years ago my 14 year old daughter and i along with three other family members went to traverse city michigan.  my 14 year old daughter was going to attend the summer session at interlochen center for the arts.  she is a creative writer.  we dropped my daughter off and checked into the marriott hotel in traverse city for seven days of fun.
> 
> the weather was warm.  at night my other daughter and i would each get up in the middle of the night.  she to turn off the air conditioner, me to turn it on.  i suggested switching beds but her answer was no.
> 
> about four nights into our stay i had already gotten up a few times when i looked out the window as i usually did each time i got up and saw an object in the field (2 to 3 am), this field was tall and grassy.
> 
> the object looked like it could have been an awning.  i looked to my left at the restaurant on the other side of the road and the large trash dumpster, i also looked at the road that separated the object from the restaurant.  this object was almost as large as the restaurant!  it reminded me of an old cadillac (dart shaped reference)  it was seamless.  it had sides that angled slightly larger on the bottom than on the flat top.  from the front point it gently and slightly angled away from where i viewed it.  the back side had the same gentle slight angle but inward to an inverted point in the middle.  it was all white, windowless, spotless!  it really looked like a dart (wide and thick).  ufo did not enter my mind.
> 
> i watched it for a few minutes trying to figure out what it could be, after a few minutes i told myself i would get up in the morning and see if it was still there.  i then went back to bed.  the next morning i can't remember looking but am pretty sure i did.  i got up had breakfast (there was a gentleman i hadn't seen before and he was dressed all in white, i smiled to myself and thought how funny it was i had seen an all white object and then this gentleman was here in all white, there were subtle imaginations in my mind at this point, very subtle)  and listened to the news where i heard michael jackson had just died.  we went home a couple days later and i forgot all about what i saw.
> 
> a few months later i recorded some alien shows and sat in shocked silence as i realized i had seen what could have been an alien spaceship and did not even realize it!  it was an episode where the british government and french government had released their ufo sightings and also the american press release on one of the major news cable stations that convinced me i could actually talk to someone about this.  i told my daughter if we ever go back to michigan i will definitely not stay in a location without a lot of people around!  we were talking about going back and renting a house on a lake.  my daughter wants to go back to mackinac island.  i would also like to hear from anyone who has seen an object like this.

i stayed at the marriott fairfield inn & suites
> 3701 north country drive, traverse city, mi
> 
> if you look on google maps there is an open field in front of it.  i don't see the trash dumpster by the cracker barrell restaurant anymore. it's changed a bit since i stayed there.  i can't remember if it was two or three years ago, my daughter is sixteen now and i made an estimate on her age at the time.
content.summary: I saw a pentagon shaped object from my 3rd floor room.  it was large, i compared it to the restaurant and trash bin even the road.  i just couldn't figure out what it was.  at first i though it was a large canopy but i doubt it.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night bed time rolled around and i went to sleep as usual. shortly after that, i got a pressure in between my eyes and up around my sinus area "while in sleep state," i've felt it before and am familiar with it. next, i got the very strong sensation of my head rushing forward like i was the hood ornament on a vehicle going 90 mph down the highway.

next, the usual kicked in, rigid arms, legs, neck, and trying as hard as i could to force my eyelids open but only getting a small peek. usually, when i peek at this moment, the room looks distorted versus when i am awake and have my eyes open. this is where it got a little more interesting. i actually felt everything around me "slow down," so to speak, like if you were to slow audio down and it got deeper and slower.

as the slowing down began, i could hear this voice talking in a deep foreign/alien language and it was not nice. funny thing is, i understood this language in my trance like half awake state and knew it was threatening and not of good intentions. next, i felt myself lifting up out of my bed. people, when i say lifting up, i mean i really felt it. so i started fighting back like i always do, i felt myself leaving my body and could see my room clear as day. the only thing on was my alarm clock which gave off a blue glow.

i was literally outside of my body and self aware, but ready to protect myself. next, i shouted "in jesus name amen!" now, i've said this before in similar attacks, and although i don't totally understand the bible and believe we don't hold all the answers, i do believe in the power of faith and that jesus had the best of intentions for us, was crucified with best of intentions for us, and was divine.

after this, things took a strange twist. i made it over to my closet door and shouted at this presence in the same tone "deep and slow," and language it had first approached me with. i was actually speaking its language back to it, basically telling it to leave me alone and that i had courage and was gonna fight it. finally, this sounds strange but i shed my skin like a suit and i was something like pure energy, but still similar to the anatomy of the human body. next, i looked down at my hands and they had things in place to fire light out of my fingers, so i repeatedly fired some kind of energy/light beams up at this presence that i can only say was above my apartment in the sky.

i was filled with love, goosebumps, a measure of healthy fear, and a sense of not being pushed around but grateful to have made it through whatever this was. i then woke up to a peaceful and totally quiet room, thinking to myself how strange this life can get.

just writing it sounds crazy, but i give you my human word it's the complete truth.
content.summary: Mid-night encounter with unseen presence speaking in a foreign/alien language, time slowed down around me, left body and defended myself

content.detailedDescription:
Veiwed object at approxly 9:25 pm to 9:30pm, object moved form se to nw at same alitutide in straight line at 2 o'clock above the horizon, object was firey with haze surrounding it, but fire was in same direction as object was moving, no contrail, no smoke, no sound, stayed at same speed and altitude until moved from sight due to distance.Color was red, orange and yellow, but not like a normal flame. speed appeared to be from 150 to 200 mph at approximately 800 to 1000 ft. hard to gauge as no reference for height or speed but moved similar to aircraft making approach but with no change in altitude. unable to see any structure as object moved directly over head from viewing point. haze surrounded the object, humid night with full moon.
first appeared above the horizon, but moved directly over head as stated above. first thought it was a rocket launch, then thought an aircraft on fire, then thought a meteror, but decided it was none of these due to speed, flight path and observation. 
was also viewed at same time by lady friend at her residence. we both saw the object from the same location at the same time. was unable to photograph the object. we both asked each other what we thought it was , both agreed not an aircraft, not a rocket, really have no idea what the object was, hope someone other than us also saw it. 
immediately wrote down our observations of the sighting, and have drawn no conclusions as to what the object may have been.
content.summary: Firey like object move directly over head-se to nw- no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was in the garage talking to one of my sons and one of my other sons, who is 11 years old, asked me to come outside.  he pointed out an orange light in the west/northwest sky.  the time was about 9:20 pm cst.  the size of the object appeared similar to venus which was higher in the sky.  the object was orange in color and pulsated in brightness.  the object seemed to be moving north/northwest and eventually faded from view.  approximately 5 minutes later, the same or similar object appeared in the same general direction but seemed to ascend from a location further north.  this time the object appeared like a fireball and seemed to be much closer.  the object appeared to be heading our direction and i became a little concerned that it would get too close for comfort.  at it's apparent closest distance or largest size, it was about the size of my thumbnail at arm's length.  the object faded in a manner similar to the first sighting.  two neighbors said they saw the object also.  i believe both my other sons saw it too.  at about 10:00 pm cst, my 11 yr old son noticed a light again.  this sighting was very similar to the second sighting. my wife had just arrived home and saw the object also.  the sightings made for a pretty exciting evening.
content.summary: Orange fireball sighted 3 times in north/northwest sky

content.detailedDescription: I stopped by my parents' house (18103) after work and was driving home thru their development. i was going down a street and the street looks up a hill and the open sky pops thru the trees and houses.  in front of my car in the sky just above the trees was a dark brown/black rectangle with a white border around it. it looked like a floating box. i couldn't imagine how a box would be floating in the air.  i looked for lights and there were none that i saw.  there was no noise at all.  it moved horizontally straight, slowly, and silently. as i was gawking at the thing in the sky, i noticed a man in a red pickup truck craning his neck as well. instead of turning to go home i followed it and poof, it was gone. i even drove around some of the surrounding streets to locate it. i was amazed and a little nervous about what i had just seen. this is now the third time in my life i have seen ufos. i have never seen one so up close and during the day. freaky. i am not happy that i did not react fast enough to find my camera and take a photo.
content.summary: Rectangular ufo lehigh valley pa
